name: Easy EU Cookie law
author: Albertolabs.com

sections.description:
Cookie law is a WordPress Plugin that helps you to comply with the new European cookie law by the easiest way.

This plugin has different design customizations and it is Multilanguage.

Github project: https://github.com/viher3/easy-eu-cookie-law
sections.installation:
1. Upload cookie_law folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Configure your settings in the ‘Cookie law’ menu.
sections.faq:
Does it automatically disable cookie usage in WordPress?

No, only alerts the user the use of cookies on the website.
sections.changelog:
1.3.3.1

  • Fixed translation error.

1.3.3

  • WordPress Translation Added (Localization).
  • English, Spanish, French and Italian.

1.3.2

  • Fixed hide message animation error on old WordPress versions.

1.3.1

  • French language added. Thanks to: Acanthoceras.

1.3

  • Configuration values saved are not reset when updating the plugin
  • Config values are now saved on ‘wp_options’ database table.
  • Config options form works now with Ajax
  • Refactored code

1.2.5

  • Italian translation (Thanks to Umberto for the translation).
  • Fixed body top extra padding when alert is on top.
  • Fixed the ‘More info url’ config value which it restarted every time plugin was updated.

1.2.4

CSS changes.
Top or bottom message position.

1.2.3

  • Responsive style.

1.2.2

  • Fixed problem with some sites name when creating the check cookie.

1.2.1

  • Default cookie law terms link modified.

1.2

  • Plugin updated for WordPress 4.0.1 version compatibility.
  • New CSS styles.

1.0

  • First Cookie Law plugin release.
